law.catch_line: On completion of household goods moving services for an intrastate move for a consumer, a household ...
law.text:
On completion of household goods moving services for an intrastate move for a consumer, a household goods mover shall provide the consumer with a written receipt that states:
The household goods mover's legal name; and
The address and telephone number of:
The household goods mover's resident agent in the State; or
If the household goods mover does not have a resident agent in the State, the household goods mover's principal place of business.
